sentences.en: He responded to my volley with a backhand, ie in tennis.
sentences.cn: 他反手一击把我截击的空中球打了回来(网球中).

sentences.en: Her backhand, however, had definitely improved.
sentences.cn: 不过她的反手球的确有了进步.
他的反手球打得不太有力.

sentences.en: I can always recognize her backhand.
sentences.cn: 我总能认出她向左倾斜的书法.

sentences.en: I wish I could hit backhand like that. My backhand is lousy.
sentences.cn: 如果能打出那种反手球多好. 我的反拍很差劲.

sentences.en: It always goes out if I use the backhand - overhead - stroke.
sentences.cn: 如果我用反手肩上击球,球老是出界.

sentences.en: It has got to be your backhand - stroke.
It often goes out if I use the backhand - overhead - stroke.
sentences.cn: 如果我反手肩上击球,球常常出界.

sentences.en: Master basic skills: the introduction of motions for forehand and backhand strokes.
sentences.cn: 加强基本技术: 正手拍反手拍动作要领介绍.

sentences.en: Meanwhile at the Sacr é Coeur the nuns are practising their backhand.
sentences.cn: 同时,在巴黎圣心大教堂修女们正在训练写左斜体的字.

sentences.en: Meanwhile, at the Sacr & eacute ; Coeur the nuns are practising their backhand.
sentences.cn: 同时, 在巴黎圣心大教堂修女们正在联系写左斜体的字.

sentences.en: Serve into the forehand or backhand corner, Deuce or Ad court.
sentences.cn: 平分区发向正手角落,占先区发向反手角落.

sentences.en: Slicing is so much easier with a backhand ( shot ) .
sentences.cn: 用 反手 拍打斜射球较容易.

sentences.en: You can spin it more with a backhand ( shot ) .
sentences.cn: 你可以打 反手 拍使旋转更厉害.

words.tran_cn: 逆打；反手一击；追加的一杯酒；（英）回扣
用手背打击；反手击球（backhand的过去分词）

trans.tran_cn: 反手的（网球等运动中的动作）

trans.tran_en: a way of hitting the ball in tennis and some other games, in which the back of your hand is turned in the direction of the ball when you hit it
